Que Huong Restaurant. 03, Lanh Binh Can St, 1st ward
Trung Luong Restaurant. Trung Luong St
Hong Phuc Hotel. 246/8, Ap Bac St, 5th ward
Huong Duong Hotel. 33, Trung Trac St, 1st ward
Minh Quan. Mid-range hotel, clean, air-con, Wi-Fi, quiet, cable TV. 550,000 dong.
Minh Tai. Clean, freshly renovated, fan/air-con 150,000-210,000 dong. Top floor is very breezy so air-con is not required.
Rang Dong. 25, 30/4 St, 1st ward. Two locations. Old dingy rooms. 150,000 dong. Normal rate is 200,000-400,000 dong.
Song Tien. 101, Trung Trac St, 1st ward. Friendly staff and decent rooms. Air-con room including Wi-Fi. 300,000 dong.
